nodes.text: A Fleebog emissary joined four fellow Fleebogs on a trip to the Ewok village of Bright Tree to kidnap the Ewok Princess Kneesaa a Jari Kintaka in 3 ABY. The Fleebog delegation shrank the princess to the size of a member of the Fleebog species with a damsel flower and brought the princess to their lair to help them fight a creature known as the ra-lugg.

The Fleebog species appears in Ewoks 11, which was written by Dave Manak and first published by Marvel Comics in 1987. The illustrations, by Warren Kremer, depict a party of four Fleebogs kidnapping the princess; however, Manak provides no distinguishing characteristics for the characters, making them impossible to distinguish from one another.
